Author: criptobear#6402
Content: hello guys, i was thinking about ways to make public aware of komodo power, maybe a double or triple interview done to people (recognised by public audience already) that represent other tokens similar to komodo like ethereum and then put them together on the screen so it will look like they answered at the same questions in the same moment, the questions would be about TPS, scaling, notarization, consensus et cetera all about putting a nice light on komodo's characteristics. what you guys think?

Author: okthen#8167
Content: @criptobear I think that's a little manipulative while KMD really doesn't need anything like that. A clear and precise outline of what it is that KMD exactly does or wants to do is more helpful IMO. The more precise, the better. If you want to highlight everything it can do, it becomes a little overwhelming and detracts from the appeal, imo it would be better to concentrate on 3 or 4 core points where it excels and outshines others. Besides this effort it can always be helpful to explain in detail every feature (separately), just not everything in one go. Just my 2 cents.

Author: Mylo#8306
Content:
Yes social media campaigns are on the roadmap.

For the community news site, what categories do you think will help?
 - ecosystem (kmd and related blockchains announcements)
 - service providers & exchanges (like chain makers, chainzilla, digitalprice etc.)
 - development/tech
 - other crypto news (competitions running e.g. for listing)
 - social media news

The beta site is up on the server it will run on.  Have a few things to test before public show

Author: Mylo#8306
Content: - community opinions

Author: Steve Lee#1967
Content: Due to the positive momentum and participation of our community in the CryptroMurmur vote, they have decided to do a feature on Komodo following DGB. Thanks again for everyone who helped vote and spread the word!

Author: Audo#5667
Content:
We just discussed last week that we will use some platform to host alll pictures/infographics about Komodo, so that should be coming soon.

On the longer term we are looking to build a comprehensive 'press kit' that contains information about Komodo so that it's easier to write about what Komodo is and what problems we solve. We are still focused on working out that base story for 2.0, but it's looking quite good at the moment.

We have those 5 blockchain pillars we have been talking about, and we are now considering to move towards describing Komodo as an architecture solutions provider.

We have worked our a website wireframe that contains this new messaging. I'll share with you guys shortly so we get your thoughts.

Author: Audo#5667
Content: Here it is: https://forum.komodoplatform.com/t/komodo-website-wireframe-send-us-ideas-and-feedback/160

Author: Audo#5667
Content: Let us know what you think
